sentences.en: Alaskan birch with white to pale brown bark.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的一种桦树,白色至浅棕色树皮.
阿拉斯加的爱斯基摩狗拉雪橇.

sentences.en: Alaskan Malamute is a noble dog with a unique hello story.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加雪橇犬是一种高贵、有奇特汗青的品种.

sentences.en: Alaskan Malamute is a noble dog with a unique history.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加雪橇犬是一种尊贵、有特殊历史的种类.

sentences.en: Best of all, here's a man who brings me fresh - caught Alaskan salmon every fall.
sentences.cn: 还有每年秋天, 他都从阿拉斯加给我带回来新鲜的大马哈鱼.

sentences.en: But his obeying the ordinary driving commands of the Alaskan trail is no demonstration that he is yours. Any dog in Alaska would obey you as he obeyed.
sentences.cn: 他遵守阿拉斯加的驱赶命令并不意味着他就是你的狗，任何阿拉斯加的狗都会像他一样对你俯首贴耳。

sentences.en: But this crab also suffers from something of an identity crisis: Imported king crab is often misnamed Alaskan king crab, because most people think that's the name of the crab.
sentences.cn: 但这种蟹类也遭受了类似于身份危机的问题: 由于大多数人认为阿拉斯加帝王蟹就是这种螃蟹的名字，进口帝王蟹通常被这样误称。

sentences.en: C. It will drain the oil reserves in the Alaskan region.
sentences.cn: 将消耗的石油储量在阿拉斯加地区.

sentences.en: Condition - The Alaskan Malamute a sledge dog.
sentences.cn: 形态 —— 阿拉斯加是用于拉拽的职责犬.

sentences.en: Drink green tea and plenty of water. Eat blueberries, wild Alaskan salmon, broccoli, almonds & walnuts.
sentences.cn: 喝绿茶和大量水. 吃蓝莓 、 野生大马哈鱼 、 花椰菜 、 杏仁 及 胡桃.

sentences.en: It's my duty to pass on the tradition of the great Alaskan lead dogs.
sentences.cn: 把阿拉斯加伟大的雪橇前狗延续下去是我的责任.

sentences.en: The Alaskan Malamute is a noble dog with a unique history.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加雪橇犬是一种高贵、有独特历史的品种.

sentences.en: The Alaskan Malamute is best judged on lead at a moderate speed.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的检查核对于最幸亏坦荡之处以中等速率举行.

sentences.en: The Alaskan Malamute should stand for examination with confidence.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加应该充满信心地站着接受审查.

sentences.en: The Alaskan ranges have a large array of simulated surface - to - air threats.
sentences.cn: 在阿拉斯加宽阔的土地上有大量模拟的地对空威胁.

sentences.en: The Falls ~ Every year, 300 million salmon return to Alaskan river where they were born.
sentences.cn: 瀑布求生–每年, 三亿三文鱼返回出生地-亚拉斯加.

sentences.en: They are moderate shedders, not enthusiastic ones such as Alaskan Malamutes or German Shepherd Dogs.
sentences.cn: 拉拉脱毛量适中, 不象阿拉斯加雪撬或德牧那么厉害.

trans.tran_cn: 阿拉斯加州的，阿拉斯加人的
